channel.title: How to change teleport locations?
channel.description:
i have the server deltascape source, working perfect, i know somebit of coding. im confused though!
How do i change the teleport location?
like.. the home teleport (varrock) it teleports to falador garden. so.... how do i change it to edgeville? i checked clickingmost, but couldn't find it. also checked client.java. still.. please help any expert coders?

item.title: How to change teleport locations?
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

idk deltascape never used it cause i thought it well in nice terms… gay… but whatever
anyways with any server i have ever used say you wanted to go to a command…? like ::home
go to client.java and type control f
and type this…“home” (with quotes) and should come up with something like this…

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by pyro } else { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }
(bleeped out my coords cause i havent released this one yet=])
anyways in the area that says xxxx put your x coords of new spot
in the y area put your y cords
so say your new spot was 3847 4839(idk if this is a place…)
so it would be…

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by pyro } else { teleportToX = 3847; teleportToY = 4839; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }

not sure if thats what you were asking for…? but yeah

Read full topic

clickingmost.java there all all teles.
click on tele then do my poss and search for the number and delta teles has been randomed.
